data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The naming is straigthforward: it simulates Perl 6's subroutine
    parameter lists, so it's named Perl6::Parameters. It should be in
    the list because several of its brothers in Perl6::* are and it
    seems stupid to exclude just this one.

    Perl6::Currying has some of the basic functionality (named
    parameter lists), but (to my knowledge) it doesn't include types or
    support for arrays and hashes.
